item.title: Setup file sharing with SMB
item.description: Having hundreds of gigabytes and sometimes even multiple terabytes can get fastly very challanging for regular transfers and backups. Therefore we can make management very easy when instead using network storage, which only needs to be mounted on the corresponding machines. The following should serve as a cheatsheet for quickly setting up samba shares on the home network. Install and setup samba $ sudo apt update && sudo apt install samba For security disable Samba NetBIOS service, as we won’t use it.
